    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_87013</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_87013</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Raising the temperature of water by heating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufwerfen der Temperatur des Wassers durch 
Heizung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Soulèvement de la température de l'eau par le 
chauffage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Levantando a temperatura da água pelo heating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sollevando la temperatura di acqua del heating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αύξηση της θερμοκρασίας του ύδατος με τη θέρμανση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Levantar la temperatura del agua por la 
calefacción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This line graph illustrates that heating water raises its temperature until reaching a constant value of 100 degrees Celsius. At this temperature, water is changed into steam.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">boiling point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">steam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm veranschaulicht, daß 
erhitzenwasser seine Temperatur bis das Erreichen eines konstanten 
Wertes von 100 Grad Celsius aufwirft. Bei dieser Temperatur wird
Wasser in Dampf geändert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphe par ligne illustre que l'eau de 
chauffage soulève sa température jusqu'à atteindre une valeur 
constante de 100 degrés de Celsius. À cette température, 
l'eau est changée en vapeur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico ilustra que a água se 
aquecendo levanta sua temperatura até alcançar um valor constante de
100 graus Célsio. Nesta temperatura, a água é mudada no 
vapor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare illustra che l'acqua di 
riscaldamento solleva la relativa temperatura fino a raggiungere un 
valore costante centigrado di 100 gradi. A questa temperatura, 
l'acqua è cambiata in vapore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών διευκρινίζει ότι το
θερμαντικό ύδωρ αυξάνει τη θερμοκρασία του μέχρι την επίτευξη 
μιας σταθερής αξίας 100 βαθμών Κελσίου. Σε αυτήν την 
θερμοκρασία, το ύδωρ αλλάζουν στον ατμό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico ilustra que el agua de 
calefacción levanta su temperatura hasta alcanzar un valor constante 
de 100 grados de centígrado. En esta temperatura, el agua se 
cambia en el vapor.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
